Stellar Focus

spell id [id]: 949

Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Stellar Focus
This spell focuses the light of the night sky into a crystal sphere. The light in the sphere is so intense and pure that pearls will start to grow from it.
Grants 5 Astral pearls each month.
